title: maha thripura sundhari
sahitya:
mahA tripura sundari (shrI) 
        mahA dEva manOhari 

anupallavi

Agama sampUraNi (vedAgama)
          vAgadIshwara rAga bhUshaNi 

caraNam

vAmcita varaprAdAyini 
        kAncipura nivAsini

          madhyama kAlam

         manjuLakara madhura vAkvilAsini
         pancadsAkshari paramEshwara manOllasini shrI
